text:
I've recently discovered a neat trick that involves bags and bugs...

I can let you in on it too if you help me out.

I'm going to need 300 small insects for reasons. Good reasons.
uponCompletion:
Heehee... these are perfect. So here's the thing. If you take some cloth like this...

You can place the insects INSIDE OF IT!

Cool, I know. Here, I'll even give you your very own paper to get started.

Who knows what other things can be put into bags!?
